    A

    Armor - Class in Unnamed Package

    Armor(String) - Constructor for class Armor
    Constructs an armor with a given type.
    Attack(int) - Method in class Character
    Applies damage to the opponent based on attack value.
    Attack(int) - Method in class Opponent
    Applies damage to the player.

    C

    Character - Class in Unnamed Package
    Represents the player's character in the game, equipped with armor and a weapon.
    Character(Armor, Weapon) - Constructor for class Character
    Constructs a new player character using the given armor and weapon.
    Charge(boolean) - Method in class Character
    Sets the player's charged state.
    Charge(boolean) - Method in class Opponent
    Sets the opponent's charged status.
